document_data.name: Elverquisst
document_data.Availability:
The [[House of Good Spirits]] was one of the few places in [[Waterdeep]] where one could obtain elverquisst. It was also available in [[Elturel]]'s famous tavern [[A Pair of Black Antlers]], where it was the most expensive drink on offer.

A private drinking establishment called [[Walking Out to Meet the Dragon]] in [[Mosstone]] of [[Tethyr]] served a wide variety of rare libations, including elverquisst.

In the late 14{{th}} century DR, a bottle of elverquisst belonged to the [[maedar]] winemaker [[Vorlon]] who ran the [[Morden Winery]], located in a valley outs the village of [[Dragon Falls (village)|Dragon Falls]] in [[the Vast]].
